name: To the Sea
description:
You're playing a baby turtle who needs to go to the sea to grow up. But there are a lot of dangers on the way. Will you be able to pass through?

Controls :

Move : WASD, ZQSD, Directionnal Arrow, Left stick of a gamepad

Jump: Space bar, Mouse left click, button A on xbox gamepad or cross on ps4

This game was made at school for a gamejam in 4 days. The theme was :"Keep it alive".

Thanks to all peoples who participate in the creation of this project:

-Jean-Bernard Geron (tech)
-Melanie de Valeriola (Anim)
-Hardy Arnaud (art)
-Benjamin Lapiere (art)
-Audélia deharo (art)
